A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Is it the greatest Star Wars movie ever? Most definitely not. But it is far from the worst. Was I a little disappointed by the reveal if Rey's parentage? A little bit but that didn't last. The more I think about it\, the more I like it. It was a fun movie and I liked what they did with Luke. He turned into the disgruntled mentor that we saw in Yoda in Empire. I thoroughly enjoyed this movie and I will be buying it on Blu-Ray as soon as it comes out.
